content: Robert H DENG | SMU Faculty Directory showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile Robert H DENG Full-time Faculty Professor of Computer Science; Deputy Dean, Faculty & Research School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS Research StatementFaculty Homepage Qualification PhD, Illinois Institute of Technology, 1985 Teaching Topics Information Security and Trust Advanced Information Security and Trust Advanced Topics in Information Security Networking Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to SUN Bing +65 68280920 robertdeng@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas and Areas of Expertise School of Computing and Information SystemsInformation Systems & TechnologyCybersecuritySafety, Security & FairnessTrustworthiness of Digital Platforms & DevicesPrivacy-Preserving Data Sharing & AnalyticsSecurity & Governance of Software/AI Systems Strategic Priorities Digital Transformation Mobile Systems and Cloud Security Mobile Computing Security
